text: Festus mba suambarar Por ga muuŋgim, zumgum rari mbari vhɨzgim, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Agripa won mbiga hɨrɨɨŋ Bernaisi, mani Festus ganɨv, ana ndikndigɨp, ana harar suigɨ zav Sisarian zergi. 25.13 Ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Agripa, ana ndia Herot, ana fhum ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan kav, ana Zon fega Zems shogim ana rimgi. Ndu Farasarigi Gumgi 12 ganɨri.
